question: Al'aurata tana kankancewa, maganin istimina I, Ina butar wannan magnin, ya ake samunsa, a Ina kuke
answerText: Eh, muna da magani da ke taimakawa wajen dawo da girma da ƙarfafa al'aurar namiji.

question: Ni daga Kano nake, ina kano, za ku kawo min magani?
answerText: Eh, muna kai magani Kano. Muna da motocinmu daga Kaduna da ke zuwa Kano, kuma za mu baka lambar direbanmu bayan ka tabbatar da biyan kuɗi.

question: Aslm, Wai dan Allah idan mutum yakai kamar shekara 8 yana aikata istimina'i, kuma yafara kusan tin be gama balaga ba, yasamar matsololi dayawa kamar karancin Mani, tsikewar Mani, kankancewar gaba sosai babu kauri babu tsayi, saurin kawowa, shin tsakani da Allah akwai maganin da zemasa magani har ya iyayin aurw ya gamsar da iyalinsa, kuma ze iya samun lafiyar da zai iya aihuwa?
answerText: Insha ALLAH,  muna maganin da zamu daura ka akai wannan mu Bawa mutane dama kuma sun Sami lafiya, muna yakinin kaima Insha ALLAH zai maka aiki.

question: Yaya ake amfani da maganin? Yaya ake shan magani
